oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Southern Cross of Honor of Sgt. John Lafayette Morgan, Co. B, 29th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Morgan was from Polk County, Tennessee and served for a time as the color bearer for his regiment. He received a furlough in early 1864 and was captured on February 10 in Murray County, Georgia. He was held at Fort Delaware, Delaware and exchanged in February 1865 through City Point, Virginia.
